column1: #   symbol:           The trading pair or ticker symbol (BTCUSDT
#   ohlc_exchanges:   Exchanges to fetch OHLC price data from (comma-separated
#   funding_rate_exchanges: Exchanges to fetch funding rate data from (comma-separated
#   - Deribit DVOL (volatility) is stored as BTC_DVOL and ETH_DVOL

column3: bybit+bitunix    - Both OHLC and funding_rate from both exchanges
